metadata.title: CVE-2021-3283 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: HashiCorp Nomad and Nomad Enterprise up to 0.12.9 exec and java taskdrivers can access processes associated with other tasks on the same node.Fixed in 0.12.10, and 1.0.3.

criterions.comment: nomad: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
